text: Tevha amhi tyanci du'a (prarthana) svikarali ani tyanna yahaya (navaca putra) pradana kela, ani tyancya patnila tyancyasathi yathayogya banavile. He neka- sadacari loka satkarmankade lavakara dhava gheta, ani amhala mothya avadine bhaya rakhuna pukarata asata, ani amacya samora mothya namratene rahata asata
